Create an Admin User
```bash
kubectl apply -f ./k8s/users/admin-user.yaml
```

Get the Access Token
```bash
kubectl -n kubernetes-dashboard create token admin-user
# eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsImtpZCI6Im5IRGtGR0pJYnRqSGFCQXB0V3ZSTy1KYl9HdjF5MUFyVXVfaERfTmRLV2cifQ..n1Dd8uTMIwi2AXirpzJwoA-uX6eWbGQcNmTq5f3oyoB4_utkophyvIZJtMUryekFTDS-zOc7zUWWKZmpJ9CCoWO9Uh0-YLAkfTTaShnaokj6feDW116s8vWFL-RNf8Db4pJwchGg3vihRijq6h3jwyoeYgV49-9-lEKBUznwklPT8TiasG0yKjTLGlG8XJcucslpZUdtVBAVf-yXAIqNIhI_WRukvqH-nisjqWQSV_9ouK1mBGqvRWkphBWH9zKvygz0EbKto5tJPlKFIHtmYbPFwBMsqR3HsCiUd7d0pmFr8oaNnxX8dUoUxdAqSBpNzGYf4Bi3557yxwaTXwnlEQ
```

Access the Dashboard
```bash
kubectl proxy
# dashboard URL
# http://localhost:8001/api/v1/namespaces/kubernetes-dashboard/services/https:kubernetes-dashboard:/proxy/
```
